title: Canceled Day of When We Were Young Festival Left ‘a Lot of Sad Emos’
description: The When We Were Young festival in Las Vegas brought emo fans from all over the world to one destination. But when weather got in the way, they mourned together.
dc:creator: Madeleine Aggeler
media:credit: Saeed Rahbaran for The New York Times
media:description: Jessica Gems, left, and Amanda Fulton traveled to Las Vegas from New York to attend the festival.
